Try "Arms and Armour of the Samurai" by Ian Bottomley
and Anthony Hopson. Also, check out The Samurai
Sourcebook by Stephen Turnbull. Both have excellently
detailed information--"Arms" mainly about the weapons,
and Turnbull about the development and how they were
used. 

Regards,

Nate

--- duendemistol <duendemistol@...> wrote:
> Hi,
> I am looking for information and images or drawings
> about the 
> japanese Teppo.
> 
> Therefore, I am very happy to meet you.
> 
> Thank you in advance
>
